title: Goliath Bird-Eating Spiders: Giant Arachnids
subtle:
Informational (nonfiction), 979 words, Level Q (Grade 3), Lexile 930L            
                        
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     J and Z
description: Capture students' attention with a books about the largest spider in the world. Goliath Bird-Eating Spiders: Giant Arachnids will give students a glimpse into how these creatures live in the wild. Fascinating images and maps support the text.
highFrequencyWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
